trans-unit.source: Click on the annotation to select it, and then drag the X of the anchor point to move the annotation by the anchor. This sample uses the AnnotationPositionChanging event to snap the annotation anchor to data points while moving the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Click on the annotation to select it, and then drag the X of the anchor point to move the annotation by the anchor. This sample uses the AnnotationPositionChanging event to snap the annotation anchor to data points while moving the annotation.
